channelName.title: Channel Name
channelName.errorMessage: Please enter a valid channel name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).
channelName.duplicateError: The channel name already exists in the category. Please enter another name.

threadName.title: Thread Name
threadName.errorMessage: Please enter a valid thread name (max 64 characters, only words, numbers, _ or -).
threadName.duplicateError: The thread name already exists in the channel. Please enter another name.

channelDescription.title: Channel Topic
channelDescription.placeholder: Let everyone know how to use this channel!

threadDescription.title: Thread Topic
threadDescription.placeholder: Let everyone know how to use this thread!

appUrl.title: App URL
appUrl.invalidError: Please enter a valid URL (e.g., https://example.com).

channelPermission.description: Change privacy settings and customize how members can interact with this channel.

channelSlowMode.title: Slowmode Cooldown
channelSlowMode.description: Members will be restricted to sending one message and creating one thread per this interval, unless they have Manage Channel or Manage Messages permissions.

channelHideInactivity.title: Hide After Inactivity
channelHideInactivity.description: New threads will not show in the channel list after being inactive for the specified duration

delete.content: Are you sure you want to delete #{{channelName}}?. This cannot be undone!
delete.title: Delete channel

deleteThread.content: Are you sure you want to delete {{channelName}}? This cannot be undone.
deleteThread.title: Delete Thread

deleteChannel.content: Are you sure you want to delete {{channelName}}? This cannot be undone.
deleteChannel.title: Delete Channel

leave.content: Are you sure you want to leave #{{channelName}}?. This cannot be undone!
leave.title: Leave channel

channelPermission.title: Permissions
channelPermission.basicViewDescription: By making a channel private, only select members and roles will be able to view this channel

warningModal.publicChannelTitle: Make this channel open to everyone?
warningModal.publicChannelContent: {{channelLabel}} will become available to all members
warningModal.privateChannelContent: {{channelLabel}} will become private and visible to select members and roles

warningChangeSettingModal.title: You have unsaved settings
warningChangeSettingModal.content: Do you want to save the changes?

description.viewChannel: Allows members to view this channel by default. Disabling this for @everyone will make this channel private.
description.manageChannel: Allows members to change this channel's name, description, and text settings. They can also delete the channel.
description.manageThread: Allows members to rename, delete, close, and turn on slow mode for threads in this channel. They can also view private threads.
description.sendMessage: Allows members to send messages in this channel
description.deleteMessage: Allows members to delete messages in this channel

channelPermission.roleAndMemberEmpty: There are no roles and members to override permissions

header.title: Channel Permissions
header.description: Use permissions to customise who can do what in this channel.

quickAction.title: Quick Actions
quickAction.description: Manage flash messages and quick menus for this channel
quickAction.valueTitle: Content (Example: Good morning, Have a good day !)
quickAction.deleteTitle: Are you sure you want to delete {{command}}? This action cannot be undone.
quickAction.menuNameHelper: The name for this quick menu item
quickAction.commandNameHelper: The name users will type after the slash
quickAction.botEventDescription: This quick menu will automatically trigger a bot event when selected.
quickAction.emptyFlashMessageDescription: Get started by creating your first flash message command
quickAction.emptyQuickMenuDescription: Get started by creating your first quick menu
quickAction.messageContentDescription: Message content that will be sent when this flash message command is used
quickAction.menuActionDescription: Action that will be executed when this quick menu is selected

changeCategory.title: Change Category
changeCategory.label: MOVE FROM {{currentChannel}} TO
changeCategory.confirmFirstContent: Are you sure you want to move

ageRestricted.title: Age-Restricted Channel
ageRestricted.description: Users will need to confirm they are of legal age to view the content in this channel. Age-restricted channels are exempt from the explicit content filter.

e2ee.title: End-to-End Encryption
e2ee.description: Enable end-to-end encryption for this channel to secure all messages.

addMembersRoles.title: Add members or roles
addMembersRoles.instruction: Add individual members by starting with @ or type a role name

threads.noThreads: There is no threads in this channel
